column4: Can anybody help me get my video card working properly in Lucid Lynx, It's a GeForce 9800GT, it works on my primary monitor, but i can't get the secondary to show, any help would be greatly appreciated

Can anybody help me get my video card working properly in Lucid Lynx, It's a GeForce 9800GT, it works on my primary monitor, but i can't get the secondary to show anything, any help would be greatly appreciated
